Translations.Text: O ona verit ona reverence GOD let kazdy soul examine co it sent ahead for zajtra. Ona reverence GOD GOD je fully Cognizant z everything ona robit
Nie bol those zabudnut GOD He robit them zabudnut! These bol the zlomyselny
Nie equal som dwellers z Hellfire dwellers z Raj; dwellers Raj bol winners
My revealed this Quran mountain ona see it zachviet sa crumbling reverence GOD My cite these vzor ludia ze they zrkadlit
He bol 1 GOD there nie bol inak god Him. Knower z all secrets declarations. He bol the Vela Gracious Merciful
He bol 1 GOD there nie bol inak god Him. King the Vela Sacred Peace the Vela Faithful Zvrchovany Almighty the Vela Mocny the Vela Dignified GOD glorified DALEKO having partners
He bol 1 GOD Creator Initiator Designer. Do Him belong the vela dobry vola sa Glorifying Him bol everything heavens zem! He bol Almighty Wise
